english.segment1: Worship the Lord with gladness, worship the Lord with gladness. Come, come before him with joyful songs.
english.segment2: Worship the Lord with gladness, worship the Lord with gladness. Come, come before him with joyful songs. You alone are the Lord. You made the highest heavens; all their starry hosts, the earth and all that's on it. You give life to everything. And the multitudes of heaven, the multitudes of heaven worship you, worship you. (repeat). Worship the Lord with gladness, worship the Lord with gladness. Come, come before him with joyful songs. Worship the Lord with gladness, worship the Lord with gladness. Come, come before him, come, come before him, come, come before him, with joyful songs.
